content: I'll definitely try out these tips to create a more engaging playlist for my Zumba classes. Since I've been going every Thursday evening for about 2 months now, I've noticed that my coordination has improved significantly, and I can now follow most of the steps without getting too lost. I'm thinking of taking my dancing to the next level by practicing some routines at home. Do you have any recommendations for online resources or dance tutorials that can help me improve my technique?
